title: I started shooting the pretty type in one of Gerry Leonidas' books
content:
Here is a teaser:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120802021015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/longs550_5566.jpg)

Here are the images:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157611213052210/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120802021015/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157611213052210/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/sets/72157611213052210/")

I don't have much so far, but I will be adding to it if possible.

These are probably the closest pictures I have taken. The paper fibers are very apparent.

I can get one large step closer and I will probably try to do that in Jan.
author: ebensorkin

comments.content: Very nice Eben, love the "r" and one on Flickr has a great "f"
You need to get a Google grant to create a new Google books for macro shots.

A nice idea! But first the MATD...

Hmmm I hadn't noticed the image from the other side slightly asserting itself before.
Very nice, indeed. Can you put larger shots on Flickr? As I get older, I want to zoom in as much as I can. :-)

Larger shots are on Flickr now. Feel free to go check them out.

Here is an example

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/3104277331/sizes/o/in/set-721576...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120802021015/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/3104277331/sizes/o/in/set-72157611213052210/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/ebensorkin/3104277331/sizes/o/in/set-72157611213052210/")
